originalText.text: highly recommend Dr. Ian Wolf to anyone seeking dental care. His expertise, compassion, and dedication to his patients make him stand out as an exceptional dentist. I am grateful to have found such a skilled and caring professional for my dental needs. I have a beautiful smile and healthy teeth!

originalText.text: I have been seeing Dr. Wolf for several years. He is a brilliant dentist ( not smart, but brilliant,!)  who is a perfectionist. His work is immaculate. He is also extraordinarily kind, gentle caring, and responsive. Whenever a procedure is taking place, he will let you know what’s happening every step of the way . I was blessed to find Dr. Wolf, truly. His staff and all the people at Manhattan oasis are  the best. You know you will absolutely be getting the highest possible level of care.!

originalText.text: My wife has been going to Dr Richter for well over 20 years and always spoke very highly of him and his staff. But, it wasn’t until I recently needed dental work, that was beyond the expertise of my current dentist, that I experienced it for myself. After receiving a warm welcome from his staff at the front desk, I was escorted to a treatment room where I met with Dr Richter. He explained the need for his staff to perform a number of diagnostic tests in order for he and I to better understand what my dental needs were. His assistants were not only knowledgable, but were kind enough to answer my questions about these tests. Subsequently, Dr Richter and I met, where he clearly explained what he felt would be my best path forward. When he was finished, I fully understood and agreed with his diagnosis. More importantly, I felt very confident that I am in good hands.

originalText.text: I had an amazing experience yesterday, thanks so much Dr Richter, Dr Han and Stephanie. Got a long overdue cleaning and my recent chipped tooth fixed all in one appointment, and I was a new patient! My wife highly recommended and she was spot on.

originalText.text: I have been coming to see Dr. Wolf for a few years now and his kindness and professionalism never cease to amaze me.  I am a very nervous patient and before finding Manhattan Oasis Dentistry, I dreaded going to the dentist even for routine cleanings. Everyone at Manhattan Oasis is extremely talented and caring from the moment you walk through the door. The front desk staff, the hygienists, everyone on their team makes patient comfort their priority. They are all knowledgeable in their field and take the time to answer any questions or concerns you may have. I highly recommend Dr. Wolf and Manhattan Oasis as a whole. They are truly the best at what they do.
